title.en: Yande Kita Mahou Shoujo no Nichijou

altTitles.ja: 病んできた魔法少女の日常

altTitles.id: Keseharian Gadis Penyihir yang Jatuh Sakit

altTitles.en: The Daily Life of a Mentally Ill Magical Girl

title.en: Fist of the North Star - Strawberry Flavor

altTitles.ja: 北斗の拳 イチゴ味

description.en:
In this *very* zany take on the dramatic series by Buronson and Tetsuo Hara, the end of the century… wasn't so bad, actually. A *very* special and brave Holy Emperor, Souther, wants to become more "involved" and to be on "friendly terms" with the noble Kenshiro & his posse. *Especially* Kenshiro. Due to his very outgoing nature, he also crashes the homes of his other buddies, often when they *especially* don't want him to show up!  
  
Join Souther as he releases his feelings in heart-throbbing, mind-bending confessions, settles complex and engrossing territorial disputes with deep and intricate consequences, enjoys the simple and introspective pleasures of a quiet dinner, and climbs the top of the rough and brutal pyramid that is the idol world - with the help of his best buddies, of course! Maybe even Kenshiro will be there - who knows!  
  
By the time it got its anime in 2015, *Strawberry Flavor* had sold over 1 million copies in Japan. The anime was composed of 2-minute long, abridged adaptations of select chapters from the first three volumes. They were placed after the main episodes of *DD Fist of the North Star* season 2.  
  
Every volume also contains at least one *gaiden* (side story). These gaiden are drawn in Yukito's (the elder sister of Yukito Imouto) normal artstyle, and expand on characters who did not receive gaiden during the Hokuto Gaiden period in the late 2000's.  
  
Gaiden List:  
Volume 1: Spade, Club & Diamond, Heart  
Volume 2: Souther  
Volume 3: Shuren & Huey  
Volume 4: Fudo  
Volume 5: Yuda  
Volume 6: Shin  
Volume 7: Falco & friends, Ein  
Volume 8: Ogai  
Volume 9: Devil Rebirth

altTitles.ja: 化物語

description.en:
Koyomi Araragi, a third-year high school student, manages to survive a vampire attack with the help of Meme Oshino, a strange man residing in an abandoned building. Though being saved from vampirism and now a human again, several side effects such as superhuman healing abilities and enhanced vision still remain. Regardless, Araragi tries to live the life of a normal student, with the help of his friend and the class president, Tsubasa Hanekawa. When fellow classmate Hitagi Senjougahara falls down the stairs and is caught by Araragi, the boy realizes that the girl is unnaturally weightless. Despite Senjougahara's protests, Araragi insists he help her, deciding to enlist the aid of Oshino, the very man who had once helped him with his own predicament. Through several tales involving demons and gods, Bakemonogatari follows Araragi as he attempts to help those who suffer from supernatural maladies.

[INKR](https://comics.inkr.com/title/2219-bakemonogatari?utm_source=mgd)
description.ru: Арараги Коёми — с виду самый обычный школьник — однажды поднимался по лестнице. Неожиданно на него сверху падает его одноклассница, Хитаги Сэндзёгахара — молчаливая и нелюдимая. Уже было подставив руки, паренек приготовился упасть вместе с девушкой, но та оказалась не тяжелее школьного учебника… Через какое-то время Коёми понял: несмотря на образ, который сложился за долгое время, Сэндзёгахара молчит совсем не из-за скромности! Больно крутой и дерзкий характер у нее оказался. А ещё она легко и быстро достает буквально из воздуха острые предметы — школьные канцтовары. Но и сам Арараги оказался не слишком прост. Он рассказал, что сам до недавнего времени был вампиром, и выручил его один знакомый — Мэмэ Ошино. Не поймешь, святой или просто старый хиппи… Он объяснил: над Хитаги кто-то подшутил. И этот кто-то — бог. Ну, а что делать обычному герою? Помогать девушкам в беде, конечно же! А их таких о-очень много…
description.pt-br: Koyomi Araragi, um estudante do terceiro ano, que é quase humano novamente depois de se tornar por um breve período um vampiro. Um dia, uma colega de classe chamada Hitagi Senjogahara, que vergonhosamente nunca fala com ninguém, cai da escada nos braços de Koyomi. Ele descobre que Hitagi não possui peso nenhum, um desafio a física. Apesar de ter sido ameaçado por ela, Koyomi oferece sua ajuda, e apresenta a Meme Oshino, um homem sem-teto de meia-idade que o ajudou a deixar de ser um vampiro.

altTitles.ja: 1/11 じゅういちぶんのいち

description.en: Andou Sora felt the limit of his talent, and quit soccer after middle school graduation. However, an encounter with a representative of Japan's national womans team, Wakamiya Shiki, moved something that slept deep inside Sora's heart.
description.pt-br: Andou Sora sentiu seu limite para o seu talento e resolveu deixar o futebol após a formatura do ensino médio. No entanto, o encontro com o representante da equipe de mulheres nacional do Japão Wakamiya Shiki, ela mudou algo que dormia no interior profundo do coração de Sora.

title.en: AR∀GO - London Shikei Tokushu Hanzai Sousakan

altTitles.en: AR∀GO -ロンドン市警特殊犯罪捜査官-
Arago - City of London Police's Special Crimes Investigator
Arago - London Shikei Tokushu Hanzai Sōsakan
Arago - 伦敦市警特殊犯罪搜查官
Arago - 魔都伦敦特殊犯罪搜查官
Arago - 魔都特殊犯罪侦查官

description.en: The story centers around two twins, Arago and Ewan, whose parents were slaughtered by monsters. Years later, the vengeful Arago crosses paths with Ewan, who has since become a police officer, just as blood begins to flow again in the streets of London.
description.ru: Это история о двух братьях-близнецах, Араго и Эване, чьи родители были убиты монстром. После этого каждый из братьев идет своей дорогой. Эван становится полицейским, а Араго преследует монстра, думая лишь о мести. Спустя годы их пути снова пересекаются, а улицы Лондона вновь омывает кровавый дождь.

altTitles.ru: Приди же в Мир Демонов, Ирума-кун!

altTitles.th: อิรุมะคุงกับโรงเรียนปิศาจ

altTitles.ja: 魔入りました！入間くん

altTitles.id: Selamat datang di sekolah iblis! Iruma-kun

description.en:
Iruma Suzuki, fourteen years old, can’t say no to any request. His irresponsible parents make him work dangerous job after dangerous job to support them, and then one day they sell him to a demon! But, much to his surprise, the demon wants to adopt Iruma as his grandson? Unable to refuse his request, Iruma becomes the grandson of the great demon Sullivan. His new doting demon grandfather enrolls him in Demon School Babyls – where Sullivan is coincidentally the principal. Thus begins Iruma-kun's extraordinary school life among the otherworldly, meeting many colorful demons, taking on daunting challenges, and facing his true self as he rises to become someone great. 

Cozy magical slice of life with occasional urban terrorism.
description.es:
Con una vida bastante desgraciada y unos padres vagos y avaros, Iruma es arrastrado al infierno contra su voluntad después de que estos lo vendan a un demonio. Pero para su sorpresa, la vida que le depara el inframundo es mucho mejor que la que tenía con su familia.

Bajo la tutela de su nuevo dueño, un poderoso, pero solitario demonio que sólo quería cumplir su anhelo de tener un nieto, empieza a asistir a un instituto del que este es director después de firmar cierto contrato con él.

Ahora, Iruma tiene que intentar adaptarse al mundo de los demonios mientras esconde su naturaleza humana y se enfrenta a los distintos desafíos que lo esperan en su nuevo instituto. ¡Su nueva vida demoníaca acaba de empezar!
description.ru: Четырнадцатилетний Судзуки Ирума только что был брошен и продан демону его безответственными родителями! Тем не менее, к своему удивлению, он оказывается теперь живет с демоном, как его приёмный внук. Затем он поступил в школу, где его дед — Салливан, работает в качестве директора. Так начинается необычайная школьная жизнь Ирумы-куна среди потусторонних, встречая много красочных лиц, принимая на себя сложные задачи, и сталкиваясь со своим истинным — я, когда он поднимается, чтобы стать кем-то великим. Уютная волшебная повседневность с случайным городским терроризмом.
description.tr: On dört yaşındaki Iruma Suzuki hiçbir isteğe hayır diyemez. Sorumsuz ailesi, onları geçinmek için onu tehlikeli işlerden tehlikeli işlere koşturtur ve sonra bir gün onu bir iblise satarlar! Ancak iblis, Iruma'yı torunu olarak evlat edinmek isteyince çok şaşırır. Bu isteği reddedemeyen Iruma, büyük iblis Sullivan'ın torunu olur. Yeni sevecen iblis dedesi onu, Sullivan'ın tesadüfen müdürü olduğu İblis Okulu Babyls'e kaydettirir. Böylece Iruma-kun'un diğer dünyadakiler arasındaki sıra dışı okul hayatı başlar; birçok renkli iblisle tanışır, zorlu mücadelelere atılır ve büyük biri olmak için yükselirken gerçek benliğiyle yüzleşir.
description.vi: Mairimashita! Iruma-kun là câu chuyện kể về cậu bé Suzuki Iruma, người đã bị bố mẹ mình kí khế ước bán cho ác ma để đổi lấy tiền tài và bình an. Cậu bé Iruma đáng thương từ lúc mới biết đi (1 tuổi) đã phải "ra xã hội" lăn lộn, buôn ba khắp nơi với hai vị phụ huynh "tưng tửng" cho đến ngày một Ác Ma đến rước cậu đến Ma giới theo khế ước. Tưởng chừng như sắp vào bụng quỷ thì vị Ác Ma già nua này đã khóc lóc yêu cầu cậu làm cháu trai ông ta, với bản tính lương thiện và tốt bụng đến cả bản thân mình cũng phải kinh ngạc, cậu bất đắc dĩ đã đồng ý lời đề nghị đó và nhập học trường Ác Ma theo ý ông ta. Chuyện gì sẽ xảy ra tiếp theo, mời các bạn theo dõi cuộc sống học đường đầy bất thường của Iruma-kun.
description.pt-br:
Iruma Suzuki, de quatorze anos, não pode dizer não a nenhum pedido. Seus pais irresponsáveis ​​o fazem trabalhar em empregos perigosos para sustentá-los, e então um dia eles o vendem para um demônio! Mas, para sua surpresa, o demônio quer adotar Iruma como seu neto?  

Incapaz de recusar seu pedido, Iruma torna-se neto do grande demônio Sullivan. Seu novo avô demônio amoroso o matricula na Demon School Babyls - onde Sullivan é coincidentemente o diretor. Assim começa a extraordinária vida escolar de Iruma-kun entre o outro mundo, encontrando muitos demônios coloridos, enfrentando desafios assustadores e enfrentando seu verdadeiro eu enquanto ele se torna alguém grande.

[ 1° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 7, Cap 44. ]
[ 2° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 11, Cap 94. ]
[ 3° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 17, metade do Cap 147.]

title.en: The Invincible Summoner Who Crawled Up from Level 1

altTitles.ja: レベル1から始まる召喚無双~俺だけ使える裏ダンジョンで、全ての転生者をぶっちぎる

altTitles.ja-ro: Level 1 kara Hajimaru Shoukan Musou: Ore dake Tsukaeru Ura Dungeon de, Subete no Tenseisha o Bucchigiru

altTitles.en: Unrivaled Summoner starts from Level 1 ~ Destroy all the reincarnated people in the secret dungeon that only I can use.

description.en:
After losing his father in a tragic accident, Shinobu Iijima and his younger sister Megumi are taken in by their father’s old friend, Ayumu.

Shinobu works hard in the hopes of starting a new life for himself. Megumi, and a mobile game called La Vita Online, are the only things keeping him afloat.

One day, Ayumu reveals his true intentions of tearing Shinobu down and getting his hands on Megumi. But just after Shinobu learns that Ayumu deleted all of his game data in La Vita, their high-rise apartment catches on fire and Shinobu falls to his death, Megumi in tow. He wakes up in a strange new world... and realizes he’s been reincarnated into the world of La Vita Online.

An announcement from the devs tells him that Ayumu is already there, and a countdown to Megumi’s arrival is ticking. Shinobu vows to protect Megumi after she arrives at any cost, even if it means he has to crawl his way up from level 1 to fend off all the other reincarnated players.
description.id:
Shinobu Iijima kehilangan nyawanya bersama adik perempuan,
 Ketika dia bangun, dia sudah bereinkarnasi di dunia game yang dia mainkan.
 Shinobu putus asa untuk memulai permainan dari awal setelah ayah angkatnya menghapus data gamenya, tetapi dia mengetahui bahwa adik perempuannya akan segera bereinkarnasi di dunia ini juga.
 Untuk menghentikan ayah angkatnya menjadi pemain top yang mengincar tubuh adik perempuannya, dia akan memulai jalan menuju yang paling menyakitkan ...!

altTitles.ja: ポケットモンスターSPECIAL スカーレット・バイオレット

description.en: Violet, the “prince of speed” who drives Miraidon, runs through the Paldea region in search of the “secret spice” to regain the ability of Miraidon! A showdown with the Nushi Pokemon! Operation Stardust! And the other main character...!?
description.es: Violet, el “príncipe de la velocidad” que conduce a Miraidon, corre por la región de Paldea en busca de la “especia secreta” para recuperar la habilidad de Miraidon. ¡Un enfrentamiento con el Pokémon Nushi! ¡Operación Polvo de Estrellas! ¿¡Y el otro personaje principal...!?
description.ja: ミライドンを駆る“スピード王子”バイオレットが、ミライドンの能力を取り戻すべく「秘伝スパイス」を求めてパルデア地方を駆け巡る！　ヌシポケモンとの対決！　スターダスト作戦！　そしてもう一人の主人公は…!?

altTitles.ja: 荷物持ちの脳筋無双

description.en:
The more he carries, the stronger he becomes! An unmatched fantasy by the weakest adventurer duo!

Ryuk, a boy with a unique skill “Porter,” which allows him to carry a massive amount of items, was being exploited as a chore boy for the S-rank party “Black Lion of Foresight.” One day, the party managed to acquire a storage item more convenient than Ryuk’s skill, thus no longer needed, Ryuk is banished inside a dangerous dungeon. Despairing in this hopeless situation, suddenly he meets a shrine maiden girl, Mio — and then?

altTitles.ja: 素材採取家の異世界旅行記

altTitles.zh: 素材采取家的异世界旅行记

altTitles.zh-hk: 素材採取家的異世界旅行記

altTitles.en: The Otherworldly Travels of a Material Collector

description.en: Takeru Kamishiro is an ordinary middle aged salaryman who was chosen by god to be reincarnated into a fantasy world in the body of a handsome young man in his prime. Takeru sets out to learn more about the world while gathering rare and interesting materials along the way to sell for money which he can use to gather even more materials ad infinitum.

The law is flawed and I'll be the one who will make it perfect. Blame the law that released you.  
  
Art done by the creator of [HIVE](https://www.webtoons.com/en/thriller/hive/list?title_no=65).
  
[Official Trad. Chinese](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/drama/feifazhengyi/list?title_no=1434&page=1)  
 [Official Thai](https://www.webtoons.com/th/action/vigilante/list?title_no=1488&page=1)
description.pt-br: A lei é falha e serei eu quem a tornará perfeita. Culpe a lei que te soltou.

altTitles.ja: 少年のアビス

description.en:
In a town with nothing, in the middle of a daily life with seemingly no signs of change, high schooler Reiji Kurose was "just" living. Family, dreams for the future, childhood friends were all binding him down to that city. He thought he would "just" keep on living like that.

Until he met her.

Is there hope in living? Is there light waiting ahead?

It's the start of a boy meets girl series which reflects the "now."
description.fr:
Dans une ville vide, au milieu d'une vie quotidienne répétitive, Reiji Kurose, lycéen, ne faisait que " vivre". 
Sa famille, ses rêves d'avenir, ses amis d'enfance. Tous ces éléments le liaient à cette ville. 
Il pensait qu'il continuerait "juste" à vivre jusqu'à la fin, jusqu'à ce qu'il la rencontre. 
Y a-t-il de l'espoir dans la vie ? Y a-t-il de la lumière dans l'avenir ? 
C'est le début d'une série de rencontres entre garçons et filles qui reflète le présent!
description.ru: В пустом городке, в разгаре своей повседневной жизни, казалось бы, "просто" жил старшеклассник Рэйдзи Куросе. Семья, мечты о будущем, друзья детства - все это привязывало его к своему родному городу. Он думал, что будет продолжать так жить и никогда ничего не изменит. Пока он не встретил ту самую. Есть ли надежда в жизни? Есть ли впереди свет? Это начало серии "мальчик, повстречавший девочку", которая отражает "сейчас".
description.tr: Reiji Kurose, hiçbir şeyin olmadığı ve görünüşe bakılırsa hiçbir değişimin de olmayacağı bir kasabada ot gibi yaşıyordu. Ailesi, gelecek hayalleri ve çocukluk arkadaşları... Hepsi onu o şehre zincirliyordu. Kendince böyle yaşar giderim diyordu. Taa ki onunla tanışıncaya dek. Yaşamanın bir manası var mı? Beni bekleyen bir gelecek var mı? Oğlan ve kızın tanışmasıyla trajedi kapıları aralanır...
description.vi: Một bộ truyện đầy u ám cùng tác giả với Hatsukoi Zombie. Trong một thị trấn nhàm chán và ngày qua ngày không có gì thay đổi, Reiji Kurose, một học sinh trung học vốn luôn "sống" như "đã chết". Gia đình, tương lai, bạn thời thơ ấu. Tất cả đều trói buộc cậu vào thị trấn này. Cậu luôn nghĩ bản thân đã "chết" cho đến khi gặp được cô gái ấy. Hy vọng nào thắp sáng cho cuộc đời tăm tối của hai người? câu chuyện về hành trình tìm đến "cái chết" để được "sống" chính thức bắt đầu.

altTitles.ja: メリーさん

description.en:
Mary-san who calls you on the phone, telling you she's nearby...nothing but a prank call, right? Witness the cute and charming life she lives!

This is based on the Japanese urban legend Mary-san.  If it makes no sense at all to you, see https://www.kowabana.net/2018/06/09/mary-san/ and it will be a lot more comprehensible, while still being cute.

altTitles.ja: 幼馴染のお悩み

description.en:
Alternative Official Raw:
* [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/116258617)

altTitles.ja: 絶叫学級 転生

altTitles.vi: Lớp học rùng rợn - Tái Sinh

description.en: A reboot of the award winning series Zekkyou Gakkyuu, with brand new stories.

altTitles.ja: 快傑ライオン丸

description.en: During the Warring States period, the demon king Gosun, who has been hiding in the Himalayas for a hundred years and has mastered evil sorcery, is aiming to conquer Japan. Shishimaru fights as the invincible ninja Kaikitsu Lionmaru with the sword given to him by Koji Kashin, Japan's greatest ninja!

The girl who was adopted by two mothers met her soulmate- another girl, when she was 16 years old. After dating for ten years, she decided to give herself to a man at the age of 28 … because she did not want to live this "abnormal life". Only after leaving her, did she finally understand the true meaning of love during those countless days and nights. However, can they still go back to the way things were?

title.en: Genshiken Nidaime - The Society for the Study of Modern Visual Culture II

altTitles.ja: げんしけん 二代目

description.en:
Genshiken follows the lives of a group of college students drawn together by their shared hobbies, and the trials and adventures associated with being otaku.  
  
Genshiken Nidaime ("Second Generation") is a continuation of the previous series, with chapter numbering starting at 56.

altTitles.en: The Path of the Perfect Evasion Healer

altTitles.ja: 完全回避ヒーラーの軌跡

altTitles.zh-hk: 完全迴避補師的異世界軌跡

description.en: A college student, Sakurai Hiroki was summoned to another world to defeat the Demon Lord. And since he got “Priest” as a job, his starting Recovery Stat was more than enough to heal any wounds, so he dumped all of his Stat Points into Evasion. In other words, he’s aiming for an Evasion Healer who will never get hit by enemy attacks. But unfortunately, people in that world couldn’t understand his ideal! The King got angry against him and labelled him as useless almost immediately! And thus, the story of how Hiroki become an odd Healer who can even avoid Dungeon Boss’ attacks with ease has started!!
description.ru: Учащегося среднего специального образовательного учреждения Сакурай Хироки вызвали в иное измерение для того, чтобы одолеть Лорда Демонов. Поскольку он получит специализацию "Клирика", его базового знания в области восстановления хватило в избытке, чтобы врачевать какие угодно повреждения, и по этой причине он использовал все очки способностей для улучшения уклонения. Иначе говоря, он выбрал дорогу исцелителя, который ни за что не окажется под ударами неприятеля. Однако, к несчастью, народ этого измерения не был в состоянии оценить его по достоинству! Правитель рассердился на героя и моментально нарек его бестолковым. Затем началась история о том, как Хироки становится великолепным мастером исцеления, который может уклоняться от самых жестоких атак боссов.
description.pt-br: Um estudante universitário, Sakurai Hiroki foi convocado para outro mundo para derrotar o Demon Lord. E desde que ele designado como "Sacerdote", seu estado de recuperação inicial foi mais que suficiente para curar qualquer ferida, então ele jogou todos os seus pontos de status em Evasion. Em outras palavras, ele está apontando para uma evasão Healer que nunca vai ser atingido por ataques inimigos. Mas, infelizmente, as pessoas desse mundo não entenderam seu ideal! O rei ficou irritado contra ele e o rotulou como inútil quase imediatamente!E assim, a história de como Hiroki se tornou um Curador estranho que pode até evitar ataques de Dungeon Boss com facilidade começou!!

altTitles.ja: 疑似ハーレム

description.en: The story of Nanakura Rin of the Drama Club, who has indisputable talent as an actress, and her senpai in the same club, Kitahama Eiji. With the power of her acting, Rin teases Eiji with a variety of personas, giving him the harem he's always dreamed of!
description.fr: Voici l'histoire de Nanakura Rin du club de drama, ayant un talent indiscutable en tant qu'actrice, et de son senpai Kitahama Eiji. Grâce à ses talents d'actrice, Rin taquine Eiji avec multiples personnalités, lui donnant le harem dont il a toujours rêvé.
description.it: Questa è la storia di Nanakura Rin del club di teatro, che ha un talento indiscutibile come attrice, e del suo senpai Kitahama Eiji. Grazie al suo talento di attrice, Rin prende in giro Eiji con molteplici personalità, dandogli l'harem che ha sempre sognato.
description.pl:
Historia dwojga członków Klubu Teatralnego – Rin Nanakury i jej Senpaia – Kitahamy Eijiego.  
Rin, przy użyciu swoich aktorskich umiejętności, odgrywa różnorodne postacie, tworząc tym samym Senpaiowi jego wymarzony harem!
description.pt: Rin Nanakura, uma talentosa atriz do clube de teatro, e o seu veterano no mesmo clube, Eiji Kitahama. Com suas habilidade de atuação, Rin brinca com Eiji fazendo várias personagens, e montando o harém (de uma pessoa só) que ele sempre sonhou!
description.uk: Історія про Нанакуру Рін, яка має талант до акторства, та Кітахаму Ейджі - її семпая, який мріє про власний гарем.

altTitles.ja: ともことみつき

title.en: Saint Seiya - The Lost Canvas - Meiou Shinwa Gaiden Bangai Hen

altTitles.ja: 聖闘士星矢THE LOST CANVAS冥王神話 番外編

description.en: Collection of extra stories related to Saint Seiya The Lost Canvas released between 2015 and ongoing

altTitles.ja: 龍とカメレオン

description.en:
Garyou Hanagami is a veteran mangaka. Best known for the behemoth of a series that is Dragon Land, Hanagami-sensei has years of experience under his belt and is always thinking up new manga ideas. 

Shinobu Miyama is not. An amateur working for Hanagami-sensei as an assistant, Miyama is nicknamed “The Chameleon” for his ability to copy the artstyles of those he works under. However, his true dream is to escape the faceless crowds and become someone. 

So what happens when a work accident causes them to swap bodies?
description.fr:
Garyou Hanagami est un mangaka chevronné. Il est connu pour son oeuvre Dragon Land, le manga le plus populaire. Hanagami a des années d'expérience à son actif et déborde d'une créativité et d'une énergie folle.

Shinobu Miyama est un dessinateur travaillant pour Hanagami en tant qu'assistant libre. Miyama est surnommé "le caméléon" en raison de sa capacité à copier le style de n'importe quel artiste à la perfection. Cependant, son véritable rêve est de sortir de la masse et de devenir quelqu'un avec une grande renommée.

Suite a un accident, les deux mangaka échangent de corps. Garyou va maintenant devoir battre sa propre oeuvre, dans le corps d'un illustre inconnu.
Une bataille au sommet du manga commence ! 
Entre le dragon qui repart de zéro et le caméléon qui tente d'imiter cet animal céleste ! 

Qui va remporter le titre du meilleur mangaka ?!

altTitles.ja: 回復職の悪役令嬢

description.en: Charlotte discovered that she was in the game world she played in her previous life when her engagement was broken off. With her cheat knowledge, she escapes from the scenario and changes her job to a <healer> in the enemy country, and enjoys a free adventurous life!
description.id: Ketika pertunangannya diputus, Charlotte menyadari bahwa dia berada di dunia game yang dia mainkan di kehidupan sebelumnya. Dengan pengetahuan cheatnya, dia melarikan diri dari skenario cerita dan mengubah pekerjaannya menjadi <Penyembuh> di negara musuh, dan menikmati kehidupan petualangan yang bebas!
description.ja: 婚約破棄されたことをきっかけに、ここが前世でプレイしていたゲーム世界だと気づいたシャーロット。チート知識でシナリオ脱出＆敵国で＜癒し手＞にジョブチェンジして、自由な冒険ライフを堪能します！

altTitles.ja: テニスの王子様

description.en:
Ryoma Echizen just joined the Seishun Academy's tennis team, which is known for being one of the most competitive teams in Japan. Its members are incredibly talented, gifted, and athletic. With rigorous and extremely intense practices, the upperclassmen of the team expect the very best from themselves and they expect even more from the new members of the team. While most of the freshmen are on pins and needles hoping they won't get cut from the team, Ryoma Echizen is confident, cool, and collected. Some might even say he's cocky, but at least he's got the skills to back up his attitude. With his virtually unreturnable "twist serve," Ryoma is sure to make the starting team.  
  
Join Ryoma and the other first years, as they train hard, make friends, and try to find a place for themselves on the team. Ryoma Echizen is the Prince of Tennis. He may be ready for the Seishun Academy tennis team, but are THEY ready for HIM?

title.en: The Strongest Lv1 Support in the World

description.en: “Even if I can only use primary healing skill, I still want to become the strongest!” The LV1 healer boy and the weakest God’s chosen girl started their journey with the goal of becoming the strongest. However, the Young man did not expect that this time would be his last journey.
description.id: “Bahkan jika aku hanya bisa menggunakan teknik penyembuhan dasar, aku ingin menjadi yang terkuat!” Seorang bocah healer level 1 dan gadis pilihan dewa terlemah memulai perjalanan mereka dengan tujuan menjadi yang terkuat.  Namun, pemuda itu tidak menyangka bahwa kali ini akan menjadi perjalanan terakhirnya.

altTitles.ja: 今日から始める幼なじみ
Kyou kara Hajimeru Osananajimi

description.en:
“Will you be my childhood friend?”

Kaede always wished for a childhood friend like in the manga she reads. When she moved next door to her classmate, Kouhei, he said he’d do anything to help her out. So, she asked him to be her childhood friend! 

The two of them have fun adventures recreating all of the things that childhood friends should do!
___
[Official X Account](https://twitter.com/kyo_osa0420)

Sunghoon was a normal high schooler until one day, he finds out he is engaged to a tiger from Korean mythology. It is foretold that the world will end unless Sunghoon marries the tiger. This story begins with the cute smile of the tiger girl.  
  
*Notice: This series reads like a manga, from right-to-left.*

altTitles.th: นักรักโลกมายา
หน้ากากแก้ว

altTitles.ja: ガラスの仮面

description.en:
Chigusa Tsukikage holds the rights to the play "The Crimson Goddess," a lost masterpiece that many would love to see brought back to the stage.  
  
Tsukikage, however, won't allow the cherished work to be diminished by an actress who isn't worthy of playing the title role. Fortunately, she has found two young actresses that just might be worthy: Maya Kitajima and Ayumi Himekawa. Though both actresses are exceptionally talented, only one can win the coveted role.

---
- **Won the Japan Cartoonists Association Award in 1995**

---

Published in Indonesian by Elex Media as **Topeng Kaca**

altTitles.ja: 見るからに怪しい二人

description.en:
A lazy surreal comedy about two men who look like bad guys, but are actually super nice!

Two suspicious-looking men, one long-haired and the other short-haired, appear in the usual park.

They look suspicious and unapproachable, but they are good guys themselves, picking up litter and searching for missing cats!

Long-Hair somehow knows a lot about the life span of snakes and the organs of rabbits, while Sort-Hair is questioned by the police even though he is just eating a meat bun.

The two of them live at their own pace today, involving various people in town.
description.ja:
悪人にしか見えないけど、実は超いい人たち!?によるダラダラシュールコメディ！

いつもの公園に出没する謎の長髪と短髪。

見た目は怪しさ満点で近寄りがたいが、ポイ捨てされたゴミを拾ったり行方不明の猫を捜索してあげたりとやっていることは善人そのもの。

なぜか蛇の寿命やウサギの器官に詳しい長髪と、肉まんを食べているだけなのに職質されてしまう短髪。

altTitles.ja: この手を離さないで

description.en:
A unique talent’s striking debut!
The “haves and have-nots” seek each other in the ultimate teen omegaverse.

I met a love I want to hold on to.

After causing a certain problem, Haruto transfers from an elite alpha school to a regular school. In the classroom filled with excitement over the out-of-season transfer, he meets the student council president, Miyabi, who, for some reason, is the only one who treats him harshly.

They have totally opposite personalities and circumstances, and, even though they reject each other, they also feel strong attraction. They gradually delve deep into each other’s hearts.

But Miyabi’s body, unable to resist Haruto’s pheromones, soon becomes uncontrollable…

Immature, painful, and fragile – the beautiful days of youth.

“I’ll never let go of you.”
“I always hated heat to death, but now…”

altTitles.ja: 路地裏プッシーキャット

description.en:
Soon after Nazuku meets Ayafumi, a playboy with a delinquent air about him, he finds himself trapped in the man's crushing embrace! "You feel way better on the inside than any girl." With those words, Ayafumi pronounces Nazuku his favorite. Nazuku's life is now a living hell, where he's forced to satisfy Ayafumi's "needs" to the point of passing out! Why oh why did he rescue Ayafumi and get involved in his life...?
Ayafumi is rough, without a hint of kindness or consideration, and Nazuku can't seem to tell him no.
But, the more they sleep together, the more their desire grows...
description.fr:
Peu après que Nazuku ait rencontré Ayafumi, un playboy avec un air de délinquant chez lui, il se trouva lui-même coincé dans l'étreinte écrasante de cet homme!
" Tu te sens beaucoup mieux à l'intérieur que dans n'importe quelle fille"
Avec ces quelques mots, Ayafumi prononce que Nazuku est son favori. La vie de Nazuku est maintenant devenue un enfer , là où il est forcé de satisfaire tous les "besoins" d'Ayafumi au point de s'évanouir! Pourquoi, oh pourquoi est-ce qu'il a sauvé Ayafumi et s'est engagé dans cette vie...?
Ayafumi est dur, Sans même un soupçon de gentillesse ou de considération, et Nazuku ne peut pas lui dire non.
Toutefois, plus ils passent de temps à dormir ensemble, plus leur désir augmente.

altTitles.ja: マウントセレブ金田さん

description.en: Mochiko Kaneda (commonly known as Kaneda-san), a self-important, clumsy sanpaku-eyed celebrity lady, climbs to the top with overwhelming financial power!!

altTitles.ja: 奴隷を調教してハーレム作る

altTitles.pt-br: Treinando escravas pra fazer um harem

altTitles.en: Training Slaves to Make a Harem

description.en: A man purchases three little slaves and begins to groom them into perfect girls for his harem. You will never have a gaggle of lolis with horns in your life. ;_;
description.vi: Đây là câu chuyện về gã chủ nhân mua nô lệ, chăm sóc giáo dục các bé lên người để hiện thực hoá giấc mơ dàn harem lý tưởng
description.pt-br: Um homem compra três pequenas escravas e começa a transformá-las em garotas perfeitas para seu harém.

title.en: Aru Hi Totsuzen, Gal no Iinazuke ga Dekita

altTitles.ja-ro: ある日、突然ギャルの許嫁ができた
Aru hi Totsuzen, Gyaru no Iinazuke ga Dekita

altTitles.en: One Day, I Suddenly Got Myself a Gal Fiancée​
One Day, Out of the Blue, I Got a Gal's Forgiving Wife

description.en:
"Hey, hey, why are you always pretending to be asleep?"

Miran Katsuki, a positive gal who reigns in the upper class of the school caste, often asks Shuji Nagasawa, an otaku. I was confused by her suggestive behavior, but she unexpectedly announced that she was his fiancee!?

A school romantic comedy between two polar opposites, Yin and Yang, has begun!

title.en: Tenshi wo Ikasete Item Get!! Ikigacha de Dungeon Kouryaku!

altTitles.ja: 天使をイカせてアイテムゲット！！ 絶頂ガチャでダンジョン攻略！

altTitles.en: Make the angel cum and get items!  ! Conquer the dungeon with the climax gacha!

altTitles.ja-ro: Tenshi wo Ikasete Item Get!! Ikigacha de Dungeon Kouryaku!

description.en:
One day, [Haruma Kozai] was suddenly transported to a town centered around a dungeon.
 The special skill he was given was [Summon Angel].

This skill with a mysterious name does not simply summon an angel,
rather it's a slightly strange skill in which angels are summoned for a price.

 ...At least that's what I thought,
but it seems like “pleasure” is the price to pay!?

Make the summoned angel cum and decide on the cheat boost.
 A very naughty journey to another world begins♪
description.ja:
ある日突然、ダンジョンを中心とした街に転移してしまった【香西遥真】。
彼が授かった特殊スキルは【召喚天使】というものだった。

不思議な名前のこのスキル、天使を召喚するのではなく、
天使が対価を受けて召喚する、ちょっとヘンテコスキル。

...なんて思ったけど、
なんと「快楽」が対価になるようで――!?

召喚天使をたっぷりイカせて、チートブースト決める、
かなりエッチな異世界攻略、始まります♪
 
--- 
 
Aruhitotsuzen, danjon o chūshin to shita machi ni ten'i shite shimatta [Kōzai haruma]. Kare ga sazukatta tokushu sukiru wa [shōkan tenshi] to iu monodatta. 

Fushigina namae no kono sukiru, tenshi o shōkan suru node wa naku, tenshi ga taika o ukete shōkan suru, chotto hentekosukiru. 

... Nante omottakedo, nanto "kairaku" ga taika ni naru yō de ――!? 

Shōkan tenshi o tappuri ika sete, chītobūsuto kimeru, kanari etchina i sekai kōryaku, hajimarimasu ♪

altTitles.ja: 私の拳をうけとめて！

description.en:
From back alley brawls to bashful bonds, two former-delinquents face their next fight: long-term relationships.  
During her high school years, Takebe was the top dog at her school. But with her old friends now living as happy riajuu, Takebe was faced with an impending sense of crisis.   
Takebe thus resolved herself to quit delinquency, but the result of that was a fated meeting with her old rival, Soramori. Losing a fist-fight against Soramori, for some reason or other Takebe was now dating her.  
What kind of relationship did the two of them have back in high school? And would Takebe ever manage to graduate from delinquency…!?
description.pt:
De brigas em becos sem saída para uma tímida ligação, duas ex-delinquentes enfrentam sua próxima luta: relacionamentos de longo prazo. Durante seus anos de ensino médio, Takebe era a maioral de sua escola. Mas com suas velhas amigas vivendo felizes "como todas as outras pessoas", Takebe se deparou com uma iminente sensação de crise. Takebe, resolveu deixar a delinquência de lado, mas o resultado disso foi um encontro predestinado com sua antiga rival, Soramori. Perdendo uma briga contra Soramori, por alguma razão ou outra, Takebe estava agora namorando ela. Que tipo de relacionamento as duas tiveram no ensino médio? E Takebe conseguirá se graduar da delinquência …?  
  
  
Other links:  
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/igaratara)

altTitles.en: The Thing Which Has Fallen From The Sky

altTitles.ja: そらのおとしもの

altTitles.pt-br: Sora no Otoshimono – Caiu do céu

description.en: Sakurai Tomoki is a normal student whose motto is "normal is the best". If there is one thing abnormal, it is that he often dreams of a girl whose face he cannot even remember, and when he wakes up from that dream, he would always be crying. He tried leaving it as just a dream… but one day, from the sky, an angel descended.
description.es: Me llamo Tomoki Sakurai. Mi lema es "La paz es lo mejor". ¿No es lo mejor lo normal?　Una de las cosas que no es normal... el sueño que tengo a diario; un sueño sobre una chica cuyo rostro no puedo recordar. Dejé el asunto, pensando que era sólo un sueño... Pero aquel día, un ángel cayó del cielo.
description.ja: 俺の名前は桜井智樹。モットーは「平和が一番」。普通が一番じゃあございませんか？　一つだけ普通じゃないもの…といえば、俺の良く見る夢。顔さえ思い出せない女の子の夢。たかが夢だと放っておいたんだが…。その日、空から、天使が降ってきた。
description.pt-br: Sakurai Tomoki tem tido o mesmo sonho estranho desde que ele era criança e acordava chorando. Sugata, um veterano em sua escola, acredita que o sonho de ser o novo continente. Mais tarde, naquela noite, enquanto espera sob as cerejeiras por Sohara e Sugata, seus amigos de infância, quando algo cai em sua direção e dentro da cratera havia um anjo.

title.en: My Next Life as a Villainess: All Routes Lead to Doom! GIRLS PATCH

altTitles.ja-ro: Otome Game no Hametsu Flag shika nai Akuyaku Reijou ni Tensei shite shimatta... GIRLS PATCH

altTitles.ru: Моя реинкарнация в отомэ-игру в качестве главной злодейки! ВРЕМЯ ДЕВУШЕК

altTitles.ja: 乙女ゲームの破滅フラグしかない悪役令嬢に転生してしまった… GIRLS PATCH

description.en: A Hamefura anthology focused on the series' female cast, published through Comic Yuri Hime.
description.ru: Сборник из 9 коротких историй от разных авторов, по мотивам ранобэ/аниме/манги "Моя реинкарнация в отомэ-игру в качестве главной злодейки" с девушками в главных ролях.

altTitles.ja: きみがローファーをはいたら

description.en:
Rinne Miki is a normal first year's high school girl who loves fashion and is close with her friends.
But, she has a caring personality too, so though she has opposite-sex friends, that never became romantic, and she lived her life without romance.
But, on the day of the school festival, she meets Toma, a boy with a slightly mysterious atmosphere to him... though she's bewildered by how aggressively the younger boy approaches here, gradually, she starts to see him as...?
description.ja:
高校1年生の三木凜音はオシャレが大好きで友達想いな普通の女の子。
でも世話好きの性格もあって、異性とは友達にはなっても恋愛に至ることはなく、恋心とは無縁に生きてきた。
そんな彼女だが、文化祭の日にちょっと不思議な雰囲気の少年・冬馬と出会って…。
グイグイくる年下男子に戸惑いながらも、だんだんと凜音も冬馬のことが…？

title.en: Anata no Kotoba no Togirema wo.

altTitles.ja: あなたの言葉の杜切れ間を。

altTitles.ja-ro: Anata no Kotoba no Togirema o.

description.en: High school seniors Akira and You are in different classes, but they have been close friends since they were kids. Akira knows there’s always been something strange about him that even he can’t understand, and it is that whenever he comes to treasure something, it soon disappears. Ever since he realized this, he has made sure not let himself get attached to anything. However, the day before graduation, something happens that puts Akira’s way of thinking to the test.

altTitles.ja: ヤンデレ日誌

description.en:
A series of different yandere images by the artist @RinRin200001.

---

**Links:**
- Retail Site - [DLsite](https://www.dlsite.com/maniax-touch/work/=/product_id/RJ420882.html) (Includes Chapter 1-50)

**Notes:**
- From Chapter 134 the author has been publishing a "DereDere version" of the comic on their [FANBOX](https://rinrin83.fanbox.cc/)

altTitles.ja: ひなこのーと

description.en: Hinako has trouble communicating with others. The moment she tries to speak, she freezes up and can't get the words out. In an effort to get better at communication, she moves from the countryside to Tokyo to attend a high school with a famous theatre club, only to find out the club has been disbanded! Together with new friends she meets at her boarding house, including a kind senior who was once a child actress, a shy girl obsessed with maid clothes, and a literary girl with a literal taste for books, Hinako's journey to take the stage and find her voice begins.
description.es-la: Sakuragi Hinako es una joven que le cuesta mucho hablar con otras personas, decide marcharse de su pueblo para ir a estudiar a la preparatoria en Tokio que cuenta con el club de teatro que tanto admira, con lo que vivirá en la residencia Hitotose-sou. Allí conocerá a Kuina, quien adora los libros y comer, a Mayuki un poco mayor aunque no lo parezca y que adora cocinar, y a la dueña Chiaki. Al enterarse de que el club de teatro de la escuela está en receso, forma su propio club de teatro.

title.en: Kaiko sareta Ankoku Heishi (30-dai) no Slow na Second Life

altTitles.ru: Неспешная жизнь уволенного тёмного солдата(30-ти лет)

altTitles.zh: 被解雇的暗黑士兵慢生活的第二人生

altTitles.ja: 解雇された暗黒兵士（30代）のスローなセカンドライフ

altTitles.en: Chillin' in My 30s After Getting Fired from the Demon King's Army
The Slow Second Life of a Dismissed Dark Soldier (Age 30)

description.en:
The dark soldier Dariel (30 years old) who can't use magic while in the Demon Lord's army, was fired for his lack of capacity. Having been raised by the previous Demon Lord himself, he finds that his adoptive brother, the new Demon Lord has little use for him. However, once he rescues a villager girl from a forest monster, Dariel is invited into her village and starts realizing that he may be considerably more powerful than what he thought…

---  
**Links:**  
- [Official LN (JP)](http://lanove.kodansha.co.jp/k_lanovebooks/comic/ankokuheishi/)  
- [Alternative Raw](https://magazine.yanmaga.jp/c/ankokuheishi/)  
- [![](https://i.imgur.com/HI4jAzg.png) Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n0617fd)
- [Anime airing on Crunchyroll](https://www.crunchyroll.com/series/G79H23XWZ/chillin-in-my-30s-after-getting-fired-from-the-demon-kings-army)
description.es: El soldado oscuro Dariel (de 30 años) que no puede usar magia mientras está en el ejército del Señor de los Demonios, fue despedido por su falta de capacidad. Habiendo sido criado por el anterior Señor de los Demonios, se encuentra con el hecho de que su hermano adoptivo, el nuevo Señor de los Demonios, tiene poco uso para él. Sin embargo, una vez rescata a una muchacha de aldea de un monstruo del bosque, Dariel es invitado a la aldea y se empieza a dar cuenta de que es considerablemente más poderoso de lo que pensaba…
description.ja: 魔王軍の暗黒兵士でありながら魔法が使えないダリエル（30代）に告げられた‥‥突然の解雇宣告！！　故郷を追い出されたダリエルは人間族の村に流れ着き、魔族では授かれない冒険スキルを開花させる！　「俺は‥‥人間だった‥‥？」駆け出し冒険者に舞い込む採取に討伐に、村娘からの猛烈アタック！？
description.ru: Тёмный солдат Дариэль (30 лет), который не мог использовать магию будучи в армии Короля Демонов, был уволен из-за никчемности своих способностей. От безнадёжности начинает новую жизнь в человеческой деревне, в которую его занесло… занесли!

altTitles.ja: リコリス・リコイル 公式コミックアンソロジー リピート

description.en:
Lycoris Recoil manga anthology by various artists.

---

**Cover**: [Atto](https://mangadex.org/author/074f389a-7f7c-49d2-aa5c-a140379ba91c)

title.en: Makikomarete Isekai Teni suru Yatsu wa, Taitei Cheat

altTitles.en: He is a matchless warrior in different-dimension world!!
People who get involved and transfer to another world are usually cheats

altTitles.ja: 巻き込まれて異世界転移する奴は、大抵チート

altTitles.ko: 휘말려서 이세계 전이하는 녀석은 대개 치트

description.en:
One day 's lunch break, suddenly a male high school student Yuzo Ogata who has been transferred to another world of sword and magic together with four other friends.   
According to the Princess of Space-Time Magician, a foreign world who summoned them, they want them to beat the Demon Lord as Heroes to save this world.
Suddenly I was surprised at four friends "Temple", but it was a relaxing expression … … where the princess told of a startling fact!
"`?? There should only be four braves though?"
"A man who was mistakenly summoned to a different world"
What will be in store as to his fate?


---

title.en: Otome Game no Hametsu Flag shika nai Akuyaku Reijou ni Tensei shite shimatta... Zettai Zetsumei! Hametsu Sunzen Hen

altTitles.en: I Reincarnated into an Otome Game as a Villainess With Only Destruction Flags... In a Dire Situation!? Verge of Destruction Arc
My Next Life as a Villainess: All Routes Lead to Doom! Desperate Situation! On the Verge of Doom

altTitles.ru: Моя реинкарнация в отомэ-игру в качестве главной злодейки… Моя жизнь на грани разрушения?!

altTitles.ja: 乙女ゲームの破滅フラグ スピンオフ…絶体絶命！破滅寸前編
乙女ゲームの破滅フラグしかない悪役令嬢に転生してしまった… 絶体絶命！破滅寸前編

altTitles.zh: 转生成为了乙女游戏里满是死亡flag的恶役千金——走投无路！破灭前夕篇

altTitles.es-la: Reencarné en un Juego Otome como una Villana con sólo Banderas de Destrucción... ¿En una Situación Terrible? ¡Arco al Borde de la Destrucción!

description.en:
As she was busy bullying the honour student with the power of light magic, Maria Campbell, along with her friends, the fifteen year old daughter of a Duke Katarina Claes suddenly hit her head and remembered her previous life.   
  
Thanks to those memories, Katarina realized that she was actually the villainess of an otome game that she had played in her previous life, with a struggle to avoid the destruction flags that would lead to her doom awaiting her…  
  
Except, there's not even a year left before her destruction end!? The story of Katarina, who is on the verge of her demise, begins now…!  


* **Note:** This is a "What-If" story to the original *[Otome Game no Hametsu Flag shika nai Akuyaku Reijou ni Tensei shite shimatta...](https://mangadex.org/title/22637/otome-game-no-hametsu-flag-shika-nai-akuyaku-reijou-ni-tensei-shite-shimatta)* where Katarina receives memories of the real world from the moment the otome game starts when she's 15, and not from her childhood like in the original work.


---
description.ru: Спин-офф оригинальной истории. Во время очередного издевательства над студенткой, владеющей магией света, Марией Кэмпбелл, пятнадцатилетняя Катарин Клаес внезапно ударяется головой и вспоминает свою предыдущую жизнь. Благодаря этим воспоминаниям Катарина понимает, что она стала злодейкой из отомэ-игры, в которую она играла в своей прошлой жизни, и её в конце игры ждут либо изгнание, либо смерть… И до конца игры осталось меньше года! История Катарины, которая находится на грани своей смерти, начинается сейчас!
description.es-la: Spin-off: Mientras estaba ocupada intimidando a la estudiante de honor con poder de magia de la luz, Maria Campbell, junto con su séquito, la hija de quince años de un duque, Katarina Claes, repentinamente se golpeó la cabeza y recordó su vida anterior. Gracias a esos recuerdos, Katarina se dio cuenta de que en realidad era la villana de un juego otome que había jugado en su vida anterior, ahora tiene una misión para evitar las banderas de destrucción que la llevarían a su horrible destino. Pero, ¡¿Queda un año antes de que termine su destrucción?! ¡La historia de Katarina, que está al borde de su muerte, comienza ahora...!

title.en: Gakeppuchi Reijou wa Kurokishi-sama o Horesasetai!

altTitles.ja: 崖っぷち令嬢は黒騎士様を惚れさせたい！

altTitles.ja-ro: Gakeppuchi Reijou wa Kurokishi-sama wo Horesasetai!

altTitles.es-la: ¡Quiero hacer que el Caballero Oscuro se Enamore de mi!

altTitles.en: A Noblewoman on the Brink of Disaster Wants to Make the Black Knight Fall in Love!
I Want to Make Black-Knight Fall In Love With Me!

altTitles.pl: Chcę, żeby Czarny Rycerz Się We Mnie Zakochał

altTitles.ja: ぷち惚れ

description.en:
My family is in debt, and we don't have enough money for my sick sister's treatment...
The troubled noble, Clarice, finds herself engaged in a political marriage with the most feared Black-Knight in the kingdom, Frost, known for "slaughtering beasts with his bare hands".
In an attempt to secure the fortune, Clarice tries to seduce the "Black-Knight", but just as she does, she discovers "her" secret...
description.es-la:
Mi familia está endeudada, y no tenemos suficiente dinero para el tratamiento de mi hermana enferma...
La nobleza en apuros, Clarice, se encuentra comprometida en un matrimonio político con el Caballero Oscuro más temido del reino, Frost, quien es conocido por "matar bestias con sus propias manos"
Con la intención de asegurar la fortuna, Clarice intenta seducir al "Caballero Oscuro", pero justo cuando lo hace, descubre el secreto de "ella"...

title.en: Kodoku no Kochou wa Donna Yume wo Miru no ka?

altTitles.ja: 蠱毒の胡蝶はどんな夢を見るのか？

altTitles.en: What Does the Poisonous Butterfly Dream of?

description.en:
This world has been invaded by bugs.

With the appearance of the "Armored Bugs," mutating insect monsters that can overcome all modern weapons, humanity has been robbed of much of its living space. The only ones who can stand against such adversaries are the "Noble Butterflies," girls who harbor "Insects" that have gone through evolutions differing from the armored bugs.

One of the candidates to become a Noble Butterfly, Odamaki Ayumi, still suffers from the fact that she is unable to become one. Her best friend, who was supposed to be with her and was her object of admiration, has left her and no longer seeks her company.

Those days of despair came to an end when she was on the verge of death in a battle with armored bugs.
"Don't think that I... will die without doing anything!"

With the end near, the girl's body transformed into a butterfly one. And the flapping of her wings will bring about a revolution in the world...!

title.en: The Magical Revolution of the Reincarnated Princess and the Genius Young Lady

altTitles.ja-ro: Tensei Oujo to Tensai Reijou no Mahou Kakumei

altTitles.ja: 転生王女と天才令嬢の魔法革命

altTitles.zh-hk: 轉生王女與天才千金的魔法革命

altTitles.zh: 转生王女与天才千金的魔法革命

altTitles.zh-ro: Zhuǎnshēng wángnǚ yǔ tiāncái qiānjīn de mófǎ gémìng

altTitles.ko: 전생 왕녀와 천재 영애의 마법 혁명

altTitles.ru: Магическая революция перерождённой принцессы и гениальной юной леди

altTitles.id: Revolusi Ajaib Putri yang Bereinkarnasi dan Wanita Muda yang Jenius

altTitles.it: La magica rivoluzione della principessa reincarnata e della figlia geniale

altTitles.vi: Cuộc cách mạng ma thuật của công chúa chuyển sinh và tiểu thư thiên tài

altTitles.th: การปฏิวัติเวทมนตร์ขององค์หญิงเกิดใหม่กับยัยคุณหนูยอดอัจฉริยะ

description.en:
Despite her supposed ineptitude with regular magic, Princess Anisphia defies the aristocracy's expectations by developing "magicology," a unique magical theory based on memories from her past life. One day, she witnesses the brilliant noblewoman Euphyllia unjustly stripped of her title as the kingdom's next monarch. That's when Anisphia concocts a plan to help Euphyllia regain her good name-which somehow involves them living together and researching magic! Little do these two ladies know, however, that their chance encounter will alter not only their own futures, but those of the kingdom...and the entire world!

---
- [Official Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n8558fh/)
description.es-la: Anis Sophia, a princesa que lembrou de sua vida passada quando criança, assim como o seu amor intenso pela magia do seu eu antigo, saiu para vivenciar fantasias nesse mundo de fantasia. Um dia, durante um acidente mágico, ela se deparou com uma cena em que seu irmão, Algard, estava rompendo o noivado com sua pretendente, Euphilia. O que ninguém poderia prever é que esse estranho encontro acabaria mudando o rumo da história.
